name: Black Friday (Siberia)
description:
Description
Black Friday - is small crowd manipulation simulator  with Top-down shooter elements.

History
You are a consultant in the store on probation. You need at any cost to prove to the boss that you can bring money.

Today is the first day at your work

Unfortunately, you're out of luck, and today is Black Friday. 

To earn good money, you need to provide customers with goods. But not everyone wants to buy. The store is small, and there is not enough space for everyone.Therefore, you will need to make sure that as many customers as possible made purchases and left the store.

Rules:

- Your task is to bring as many usual visitors as possible to the exit. 
 1 man = 1$
- You only have 2 minutes
- Demons do not want to buy anything - they can be killed from a shotgun
- If you kill 8 good buyers - you lose
- The "police whistle" scares everyone and allows you to control the crowd

Control:

Movement:                       W,S,A,D
Fire:                                       Left Click
Police Whistle:               Space
Pause:                                   Esc

A little about developing:

The game was made on LudumDare 42 by two members of OkayStudios. The game was based on experience and some of the latest studio developments that were used in Liberator TD (Top Down Shooter + Tower Defence) All 2D was taken from open sources. This Ludum Dare is our first.

We are very interested in whether you like the prototype and why.
